metadata.name: ADSI-Cache File Creation By Uncommon Tool
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of an "Active Directory Schema Cache File" (.sch) file by an uncommon tool.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\local\\microsoft\\windows\\schcache\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.sch')) AND NOT ((endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\program files\\cylance\\desktop\\cylancesvc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\ccm\\ccmexec.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\dllhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\dsac.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\efsui.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\mmc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\svchost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\wbem\\wmiprvse.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\ccmsetup\\autoupgrade\\ccmsetup')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\program files\\sentinelone\\sentinel agent'))) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\program files\\')) AND contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\microsoft office')) AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\outlook.exe'))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\landesk\\ldclient\\ldapwhoami.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\program files\\citrix\\receiver storefront\\services\\defaultdomainservices\\citrix.deliveryservices.domainservices.servicehost.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of an "Active Directory Schema Cache File" (.sch) file by an uncommon tool.

metadata.objective: False positive: Other legimate tools, which do ADSI (LDAP) operations, e.g. any remoting activity by MMC, Powershell, Windows etc. References: https://medium.com/@ivecodoe/detecting-ldapfragger-a-newly-released-cobalt-strike-beacon-using-ldap-for-c2-communication-c274a7f00961, https://blog.fox-it.com/2020/03/19/ldapfragger-command-and-control-over-ldap-attributes/, https://github.com/fox-it/LDAPFragger
